column5: Thought you guys might enjoy this, I thought it was pretty cool  ***Warning***some "adult" language due to who the competition was and how intensely they "competed"   http://break.com/index/whales_ruin_fishing_trip.html

thats amazing  ,i have also heard reports of killer whales following salmon fishing charter boats out in british columbia,they seen to know that these boats catch salmon which is very high on their menu,and will wait till a fish is hooked and try to do the same as in that video,....pretty cool.....cheers
wow that was awesome! haha... i hope they gave back the whales the rest of it!
Killer whale 1/2 Salmon anglers 1/2  Hey, at least they shared.
That was a cool video.  If they had been carrying a gaff though...

At least with the Orcas, its a quick bite of the fish,  whole or half, you will never have the chance to land one, nor would you want to. Have seen video of the seals taking hold of fish being fought, and also getting hooked in the process, not a pretty sight, and not fun.
